briefTitle: Randomized Safety Study of CVT-301 Compared to an Observational Control Group
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Randomized Study Investigating the Safety of CVT-301 (Levodopa Inhalation Powder) in Parkinson's Disease (PD) Patients With Motor Response Fluctuations (OFF Phenomena) Compared to an Observational Cohort Control
summary: This study is a 12-month, open-label, randomized, multicenter study which will evaluate the safety and efficacy of CVT-301 for the treatment of up to 5 OFF episodes per day in Parkinson's Disease (PD) patients experiencing motor fluctuations (OFF episodes) and will include a concurrent observational cohort of PD patients managed using the usual standards of care.

primaryOutcome.measure: Pulmonary Safety Assessed by Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 Second [FEV1]
